00015 #define CACHE_HIT 1
00016 #define CACHE_MISS 0
00017 
00018 #define CACHE_UNLOCKED 0        // Fully dynamic cache
00019 #define CACHE_LOCKED_PRELOAD 1  // Replacement policy is off, but
00020                                 // new blocks can be loaded in the cache
00021                                 // (in invalid cache lines only)
00022                                 // This mode is useful during preload phase
00023 #define CACHE_LOCKED 2          // Locked cache (block replacement and
00024                                 // loading of new blocks are both forbidden)
